double.name: backGroundValue
double.description: Set the background value of the image
double.label: Back ground value

boolean.name: useMinMaxIntensity
boolean.description: Use the min max intensity set by parameter. Defaults to compute the values.
boolean.label: Use minimum maximum intensity

double.name: minIntensity
double.description: Minimum intensity to run the RLE
double.label: Min intensity

double.name: maxIntensity
double.description: Maximum intensity to run the RLE
double.label: Max intensity

integer.name: numberOfIntensityBins
integer.description: Number of intensity bins to build the histogram
integer.label: Intensity Bins

boolean.name: useMinMaxSize
boolean.description: Compute the minimum and maximum size of the component. Defaults to compute the minimum and maximum size
boolean.label: Max intensity

integer.name: minSize
integer.description: Minimum size of the connected components in the image to run the RLE
integer.label: Min size

integer.name: maxSize
integer.description: Maximum size of the connected components to run the RLE. If size is -1, there is no cap for size.
integer.label: Max size

integer.name: numberOfSizeBins
integer.description: Number of size bins to build the histogram
integer.label: Max intensity

string.name: outputHistogramCSV
string.description: Filename to store the histogram in CSV format
